title: How to Not Care What Others Think | Tom Bilyeu AMA
description: Tom answers questions from the community. Impact Theory is proudly sponsored by Skillshare. Start learning on Skillshare today at skillshare.com/impact Subscribe to our Channel: http://bit.ly/2HP4F3h PEOPLE MENTIONED Michio Kaku episode: http://bit.ly/2vs2VdL [04:26] Naveen Jain episode: http://bit.ly/2qL3zym [07:38] BOOKS MENTIONED Grit by Angela Duckworth: https://amzn.to/2qHKz3S [03:51] Principles by Ray Dalio: https://amzn.to/2HKAquo [13:16] How to Self-Publish Comics by Josh Blaylock: https://amzn.to/2vwCl3g [20:27] QUESTION TOPICS Tom breaks down how to ignore what other people think of you [00:21] Tom discusses how to be honest with yourself about having grit. [03:21] Tom talks about accessing who you actually are. [05:45] How Tom approaches wanting to help those closest to you. [07:19] Tom discusses the right way to live life - *spoiler alert* there isn't one. [10:02] How Tom approaches transitioning to employee/employer using Principles. [12:12] How Tom gets over the "I am never good enough" mentality. [14:07] Tom talks about which is better: experience or knowledge. [16:36] How Tom approaches beginning a business. [17:53] What Tom is reading to understand the world of comics. [20:17] Tom's advice on determining between super specific and general goals. [21:07] Tom talks about how he takes notes about his ideas. [24:15] What legacy Tom wants to leave the world. [25:50] How Tom determines whether video games are a waste of time. [27:01] Tom discusses how being in competition is not a bad thing. [29:41] What Tom believes is the most important part in judging progress: metrics. [30:59] Tom explains his steps to building a growth mindset in detail. [33:10]
